gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 119, Kings 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Kings, 119-99. Kawhi Leonard led the way with 31 points, four rebounds and three assists for the Clippers, while James Harden added 15 points, six rebounds and seven assists in the victory. Keegan Murray tallied 17 points, seven rebounds and three steals for the Kings in the losing effort. The Clippers have won their 5th consecutive game and improve to 13-10 on the season, while the Kings fall to 13-9.
